description:
In this detailed course, our aim is to teach you all the concepts needed for project selection methods for PMP® exam. We will especially concentrate on economic models… Such as Internal Rate of Return, Payback Period, Cost Benefit Analyisis, Present Value and Net Present Value.

In the course, there are lots of examples so that you understand all the concepts very easily.

At the end of the course, there are sample questions. These questions are aimed to solidify your knowledge about Project Selection Methods concept.

This course includes:

  • Internal Rate of Return
  • Payback Period
  • Cost Benefit Analysis
  • Present Value
  • Net Present Value
  • Accounting Terms To Know


Disclaimer: PMI, PMBOK, PMP and CAPM are registered trademarks of Project Management Institute
title: PMP® Certification: PMP® Project Selection Methods in DETAIL
